sentences.sContent: Major restoration work will begin in May.
sentences.sCn: 大规模的修复工作将在5月开始。

synos.tran: 恢复；复位；王政复辟；归还

remMethod.val: 来自restor (e) (恢复) + ation → 恢复； 复位

words.tran: 滋补的，有助于复元的；恢复健康的
修补者；[计] 复位器；[计] 恢复设备；修建者

trans.tranOther: when you repair something such as an old building or a piece of furniture, so that it looks the same as when it was first built or made
